headings.usage: All section titles, hero headings, and card titles. Use tight tracking (-0.02em) for sizes above 32px.

body.usage: Paragraphs, navigation links, form labels, and table data.

mono.usage: Technical specs, pricing numbers, and code snippets.

primary.name: Tech Saffron
primary.usage: Primary buttons, active states, key highlights, icons.

secondary.name: Deep Circuit Blue
secondary.usage: Footer background, hero text, secondary buttons.

textures.circuit_pattern: Use a subtle SVG circuit board pattern with 0.03 opacity on section backgrounds.
textures.noise: Add a 2% noise overlay on solid color blocks to prevent flatness.

navbar.classes: backdrop-blur-md bg-white/80 border-b border-slate-200/50 sticky top-0 z-50
navbar.content: Logo on left, Links centered (hidden mobile), CTA 'Contact Quote' on right.

hero.structure: Asymmetric grid. Text block (col-span-full lg:col-span-5), Hero Image (col-span-full lg:col-span-7).
hero.elements: Bold Headline (text-5xl+), Subtext, Dual CTA (Enroll vs Repair).

services_grid.structure: Grid with varying card sizes. Highlight 'Motherboard Repair' or 'Smartphone Repair' as larger cards.

achievements.structure: Gallery of student success stories. Use 'Marquee' for placement logos if applicable.
achievements.admin_feature: Admin panel must allow uploading photo + student name + company placed.

enrollment_form.structure: Single page but visually grouped. Personal Info -> Course Selection -> Contact.
enrollment_form.components: Shadcn Input, Select, Textarea. Use 'Card' container with generous padding (p-8).

buttons.primary: bg-orange-600 hover:bg-orange-700 text-white shadow-lg shadow-orange-600/20 transition-all duration-300
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-900 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50 hover:border-orange-200 transition-all duration-300

cards.service_card: bg-white border border-slate-100 p-6 hover:border-orange-200 transition-colors group relative overflow-hidden
cards.student_card: bg-white rounded-xl overflow-hidden shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow

setup: Configure 'tailwind.config.js' to use the custom color palette (Tech Saffron & Deep Circuit Blue).
Ensure 'Manrope' and 'IBM Plex Sans' are imported in index.css via Google Fonts.
implementation_order: 2. Build Home Page (Hero, Services Grid, About).
5. Build Admin Panel (Simple Dashboard for Uploads).
critical_rules: Do NOT use default Shadcn black/white only. Inject the Orange/Blue brand identity.
Ensure the Enrollment form is mobile-responsive (stack columns on mobile).
The Admin Panel should be simple but secure (mock auth is fine if not specified).
Use 'sonner' for form submission success toasts.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. Avoid this.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable.
